content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i live on 40 acres near terlingua, tx.  approximately 4:am  i woke up and could not go back to sleep.  i got up and dressed to step out and have a smoke.   off to the west/sw, i saw a bright pulsating object about 35 degrees off the horizon.  the lights were red and blue.  they were very distinct.  i watched with great curiosity trying to rationalize what i was witnessing for quite some time.  (about 15 minutes)  i then went in the rv and got my binoculars.  it was then that i saw the true shape of the craft.  it was very similar to a top or diamond.  the lights seemed to be pulsating from the center of the craft.  i stood and stared at this object for about another 5 minutes or so, then i saw it drop lower on the horizon, then move to the right for about 30 seconds, then move back to the left.  after about another 20-30 seconds, it moved back to a center point between the left and right positions, and rose back up.  approximately 60 seconds after it had moved back into it's original position, i saw a quick flash in my peripheral vision.  i looked over to the north east and witnessed another craft of some type, only smaller than the first (or farther away...I don't know)  this second object was also pulsating the same colors as the first.  at this point i tried to wake my wife.  she would not get up.  i watched the two objects hover for about another 5 minutes, then i went back into the rv.  i sat in awe, trying to figure out what i had just witnessed.  i went back out side about 30 minutes later, and both craft were gone.  

the purpose of this letter to to inform you that there have been multiple sightings down here, and they are still happening, almost on a nightly basis.  some people have gotten pictures.  we have witnessed this in different directions over the past year.  sometimes to the east, sometimes to the south...This particular event was the closest i have seen...

respectfully submitted,
content.summary: Hovered for approx 30-40 minutes then dropped and moved left to right

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home when my father told me to go out beause he had seen such a beatiful huge full moon. i took my cell phone with me because i like taking photos or videos. besides my cell phone was kind of new. 

i wanted to take a picture of the huge moon when i saw an object moving around then i put down my cell phone to make sure that it was an object hanging on the air. so instead of taking the picture i decided to make a video which lasted about 30 seconds. 

ps: you will see a big white light- the moon- and a smaller object - what seems to be a ufo. i'm attaching two videos  but the shortest one it's the one i'm interested the most due to the object moves rapidly.
content.summary: I saw a shining object moving around when i was in a parking lot near home in bogota

content.detailedDescription: I was in a shopping center parking lot, the weather was sunny and clear. i noticed a jet flying overhead, heading southwest from washington, dc. directly above the jet was an object exactly keeping pace with it. the object was at least the size of the jet. it was too far above the jet to be in any way attached to it, and it was too close to be in any kind of approved flight path. the jet had a huge contrail, the object above it had none. i watched until the jet and the object flew out of sight.
content.summary: Flying along above a jet heading southwest out of dc

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south from oswego to fulton on rt 481 with my wife and dog.  a very bright shining aircraft appeared a mile away directly above the highway ahead of us.  i slowed down and we watched it until my wife said "what is that?  it looks like a cigar."   i didnt have my glasses so i could not see in full detail, but i could see that it was a bright white object that moved more erratically than other aircraft i have seen (i build model planes so im familiar with most types).  the object started moving south and  blending in with very distant clouds and eventually we could not see it.  we continued driving and 10 seconds later my wife said "wait, its coming back at us."  i pulled over and it was now moving north and was situated further east than when we first saw it.  it was probably surveying the small airport in that area.  we found a camera and took some vid and pics.  there was not one sound despite its close proximity.  the absence of engine noise was most alarming to me, coupled with its erratic flight and high steady speed.  the 2 pics are high megapixels, but one is slightly zoomed.  the object is in the approximate center, quite small.  it can be zoomed quite nicely in photoshop.  the video is alright but low res.
content.summary: Attention grabbing flash and erratic flight

content.detailedDescription:
1. jan.7,2012 we were outside the front of our home and looked up at the sky and saw what appeeared to be a bright object hovering but stationary lower than the stars that were out that evening. 

2.What made us notice was the brightness and apeared to have a round globe shape and sometimes what looked like wings making the whole object look triangular at times.
jan.8,2012 another sighting, but different location 

3.I thought it was a ufo

4.Very bright white globe shaped or round with sometimes a triangular shaped wing. at times it moves obruptly side to side and thats when it appears to have to wings to make it move. 

5. wondering what it could be,was it a satelite or what. we were a little scared.

6. we just went in the house after seeing this. the object or ufo has been either close to my house or across the hywy or back again for about two weeks maybe longer.
content.summary: Has been seen every evening  for past two weeks

content.detailedDescription: My father and i had just visited with my mother, in her nursing home, and  were on our way to pick up fast food and then go to his home on the near south side of indianapolis. it was around 7:00 pm 1-9-12. the sky was very clear and the moon very bright. we were talking about how beautiful the full moon looked and the fact that it was hard to see the stars when in the city. we were driving north then turned west. after turning west, still talking about the way the stars look like out in the country, we noticed a bright spot a little south of direct west. it seemed to be way to high to be a light on a tower or building. we drove 12 to 14 blocks west discussing what it might be, even stopping at a red light and watching it, commenting on how it never moved. while at the stop light, a jet flying very low passed in the distance to the west of us moving from the south to the north. it was way lower than the light. the jet was close enough to make out the details of the shape. the "light" seemed to both of us to not cast any beam of light but to just be in the shape of a lighted upside down v. dad commented on the fact that the indianapolis airport was to our south west and it might be a helicopter but i thought it was farther west than the airport and it just stayed too still. it was so far away it just looked like a very bright star. we turned left (south) and had gone another 2 blocks when another light appeared rising straight up to almost level with the first light. it looked like the same size and brightness. we pulled into a fast food place, bought sandwiches and sat there a minute or two watching both lights just hang there. we drove home (maybe 5 minutes) with the lights to our back. when we pulled up at dad's house my car was parked facing west and we sat there for maybe 2 minutes, watching, noting that the second light had not moved. the second light then began to move and we got out of the car and stood on the street watching. the second light moved east and in a wide arc. it was still somewhat south of us but as it reached a point a little south east of us the arc got a bit tighter and it was then headed north east. it passed to the east of us and when it did we got a clearer look at it. it was still so high that we could not make out real details but it had a longish shaped body and was blunt on both ends. there were 4 yellowish, round, lighted areas on the back end stacked 2 on top of 2. there were 2 white lights on the front, about the same size as on the back, sitting side by side and the wings were boomarang shaped with a smaller light-blue light near the tip of each wing. none of the lights blinked. the wings seemed to not come out the side of the body but be on top of it. it moved very fast and there was no sound. it dissappeared into the north east within seconds. the origional light was still in the same place when i went to bed at 10:00 pm but was gone at 5:00 am when i got up for work. i don't think me or my dad were frightened in any way. we just felt puzzeled.
content.summary: Very clear. saw stationary light. several minutes later another light rose stright up to almost level with the stationary light then later began to move in an arc off to the north east.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my quad in the field behind our house. the sky diving club was jumping today, which they do often, the airport is just down the road. as i was watching them come down i saw what looked like the top of a big white ball hiding in the pine trees. after about 30 seconds it stated to rise above the trees and started to slowly move southwest. as the white ball, it looked like a 15 foot ball, got over or almost over williamston it shot up and was gone in a blink. the ufo made no noise at all and for whatever reason as far as i know that was the last time they jumped at this airport.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White ball ascent above trees went south west over williamston then  shot up and was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i was outside ready to pack up the camera i was in my backyard and the time was exactly 8:00pm, i had just finnished filming the stars and i put my sony handycam 8mm on stanby.

2. what made you first notice the object?
i was facing east and i had my camera and my tripod infront of me. i was just looking about at the different constellations and in the right corner of my right eye i saw a yellow light.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
at first i though it was a plane due to the colour, but when i turned my head to the right facing south and looked at the object.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
when i first got a look at the object. it was a massive black triangle with 3 yellow-orange sorta dimmed out lights on it. as it flew from south to north directly over me. as it was directly over me a blue-ish glow appeared and radiated around the edges of the craft. the craft was massive. if the moon was directly above me it would have covered it. it made no noise and it didn't even create a draft.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
my initial reaction was nothing i froze in shock and i had major goosebumps all over my body i just looked at it as it flew over me with my mouth open. after it went off into the distance i was soo over joyed i'd seen it i yelled out "i saw a triangle" a couple of times.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it went off to the north. and just got smaller as it went into the distance
content.summary: Black triangle that emitted a blue glow  with 3 yellow-orange lights that emitted a blue glow

content.detailedDescription:
Something exotic or other worldly just buzzed by the house heading east...... 

central illinois.
12:45 am.
altitude less than 300 feet, more than 100 feet
first heard it as it approached from the west about a quarter of a mile away, last heard it as it passed over our house heading due east.

i woke up and was laying in bed, within a 25 seconds of waking i head a thrumming sound coming from the west passing over the house heading east.

it made a deep deep (marble bouncing on a table) sound. an even sound with an even space, each cycle was a second in duration.

buuud-ud-ud-ud-udum............Buuud-ud-ud-ud-udum............Buuud-ud-ud-ud-udum............Buuud-ud-ud-ud-udum............

four thrums to cover a quarter mile of sky. quarter mile in four seconds. it also didn't have the doppler effect, thus the thrums were an even cadence and tone and volume. as it passed over the house i felt the vibration of the last thrum.
content.summary: Quarter mile of sky covered in 4 sec, deep 1/2sec thrum, 1/2sec silence repeat.

content.detailedDescription:
In st. charles mo. my friends and i saw 4 glowing spheres roughly 5 miles in a diamond shape. i saw the orginal when i saw 3 lights and 1 took off to the south and 1 took off to the north. while one stayed hovering. the one that went north then turned around and went south with the other one. the one that stayed hovering was the center peice that i then saw of the 4 creating diamond shape. i then went out back and another flew over my head from the north. it had 2 constant yellow lights and one flashing red. the four out front had a blinking blueish redish yellowish multicolor flashing lights. i then saw a yellow light come up from behind a house to the east and go straight up then head south. the lights are still floating outside.
i have attached a short video of the main closest one. it has been hovering for two hours now encounting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four hovering lights due east. two took off to the south. saw others scoping.

content.detailedDescription: While driving down hookcreek blvd.(heading towards rockaway turnpike in queens, ny.) i looked into the sky at the sunset and saw the sun and trails coming from it almost as it was on fire. while observing further i noticed that it wasnt the sun and it was slighty to the left and much smaller than the sun. as we continued driving it began to change color it became a yellow/orange almost as if it were on fire. naturally we continued to watch the object thinking it might be an asteroid or something crashing to the earth. after about an hour it slowly faded into a reddish/purple streak in the sky. i firmly believe this was a ufo based on my observations.
content.summary: While driving down the road entering the far rockaway area i observed a sun like light in the sunset.

content.detailedDescription: Id been seeing the ufos for the past few months now. i had a feeling lastnight to look. usualy they come around midnight but last night it was 8pm and id never seen them that low befor. there were several of them in the sky but 2 were closest to the ground. they were hovering and were very bright. like circles with flashing lights in all different colors of the rainbow. they stayed for a few hours befor raising into the sky, they were quiet. the other was a cigar shaped and it was yellow, id never seen that 1 befor. and i recorded them on video camera. i plan to continue documenting them. since this happends alot now ive noticed a pattern. they leave when the helicopters come and the next day the helicopters stay circling in the same area the ufos were that night.
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Diamond,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Large quiet circle shaped ufo with flashing lights in all colors of the rainbow hovered for a few hours and acended into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and kids were driving along 45 highway heading home on january 8th around 7:10 pm. we were traveling westbound on 45 highway and then all of the sudden to the south of 45 highway there were two bright orange orbs in the sky above the tree line. one was still and the other orb was going around it in circles. i then proceeded to pull of the highway so my wife could take pictures of it and with the blink of an eye they were gone. now i do know fort leavenworth is close to this area. could it have been some military operation at night. i have no idea. all i know is i saw something last night and hopefully someone else saw the same thing.
content.summary: Orange orb in parkville missouri

content.detailedDescription:
In about dec 1977 my husband and i went to visit his family for a family reunion. i had just graduated from college the year before, so was 23 years old, and my husband was about 27. i was an office worker at the state capitol and he was a certified auto mechanic. 

we drove from tampa fl to houston tx, taking the interstates, driving west passing thru new orleans. as we were passing thru new orleans i woke up and a few minutes later saw very bright light approaching in the western sky. husband was driving and saw it too. we speculated about what it could be, even laughing about a ufo.  we at first thought maybe there was an airport nearby. at this point we were still on the outskirts of the city and i believe there was a little air traffic, but nothing else in the sky nearly as bright as this light.  as we continued to drive west we eventually left behind any town area and continued over bayou/swamp on elevated divided hwy/bridge road. we continued to watch the bright light, as it was interesting and the drive was a long one.

although initially we were tracking it toward our right front of our car heading west and it appeared far away as just a very bright light, as we watched it seemed to travel thru sky toward the left side of our vision, so when we finally passed it, it was on the far left (drivers side of car). (sort of like a lazy 's' curve.)

we saw that the light we had been watching appear to stall over a cypress swamp. no civilization/man-made structures/towns were nearby, nothing but swamp and water and bridge/road. the object appeared to stall or hover over the swamp above a stand of very high cypress trees. there were no power poles or other structures anywhere nearby that would confuse where it was or could be attached to. it appeared to be just floating silently, alone. we had watched the light for at least 20-30 minutes by this time, and now were considerably closer.

it was a good way above the trees, probably at least 50 ft. from the roadway the ufo was perhaps 500 ft to our left, and 150 ft up. it was massive. we were struck by how large it appeared to be, like the size of a football field or 10 large houses stuck together.

altho this was at night time around 2 am, the stars were very bright. the ufo appeared to be shaped like a capital "h" and had appendages like antennae and/or machines all over its surface, not smooth at all. we could determine its shape through the stars, as it was a very clear, still, cold, starry night with enough light to make out the shape easily. 

it didn't move and we drove slower and slower, finally passing it altogether. as we were now driving on an elevated roadway bridge over a swamp, there was no place to stop or pull over or even call for help. during this entire time we passed only a couple other cars heading east into new orleans but i could not tell if they saw the ufo or not. 

this might sound stupid, but as it wasn't moving, nor making noise or doing anything at all but hovering, we just kept driving west, not quite knowing what else to do. it didn't seem like a good idea to just stop and get out. we were driving over the bayou, in the dark. plus, we were still on a divided road with the object hovering on the farthest side of the separate eastbound bridge to our left.  

we just kept asking each other, 'what is it?'  eventually we reached the end of the swamp area and pulled over, the ufo miles behind us.  my husband and i decided to sketch independently of each other what we each thought we saw. we both drew an 'h' shape.

when we got to houston we spent time with family and went to see the new movie, "close encounters of the third kind". i recall being a little freaked when we saw something in the film that was close in shape to what we saw that night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: in about 12/1977 saw very bright light in sky west of new orleans. visually watched it for about 20-30 minutes, we eventually passed it and saw a massively huge 'h' shaped object appearing to hover silently in the sky above a swamp.

content.detailedDescription:
I arose at approx. 03:30 in the morning, got dressed and went into the kitchen to start the coffee pot, looked out the window in our dining room that faced the gila mountains in the gila wilderness area, and noticed a large, very bright, strob-like light moving northward directly over the turkey creek camp ground area.  this light was different from an aircraft type strobe in that it flashed twice, then about a 1 second of no flash, then another 2 flashes, and so on for about 2 minutes, then it ceased flashing and disappeared.  at the same time i noticed other lights in the same area, i seem to remember about 6 to 8 strobing lights, 2 were bright solid lights, moving at different directions and speeds with various altitude changes.  i wondered if they might have been military aircraft, but, even with looking through binoculars, no wings, red or green nav lights, or anything else that would identify aircraft was seen.  no sound at all.  i estimate they were more than 10 miles away, and were about the size of an average star as seen with the unaided eye, with the exception of the very bright double strobing light which was approx. the size of venus, but much brighter! 

most of the single strobing lights were moving in fast circles with major altitude changes.

i have questioned individuals i am familiar with, but noone so far witnessed this sighting other than me.  needless to say, i was transfixed at this sight and watched for about 5 minutes when they all went out and disappeared!

i have no idea as to what i saw, but they were real, and they were moving as described.  once again the turkey creek camp ground was busy, however, the time since this sighting has been very quiet, except for the various commerecial aircraft that travel through this area on a regular basis.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Numerous lights visible above turkey creek campground

content.detailedDescription:
Carl, i have never sent anything or reported anything on an ufo in my life. however, i do believe in et.   

has anyone besides me reported a sighting over jacksonville , fl?  i'm hoping you cover duval county but didn't see it listed on the flmufon web page.

about 10:10pm 01/07/2012 i took my dogs out for some business and was facing southeast at the 3:30 to 4 o'clock position and noticed an orange disc above the old channel 30 television tower. it had no strobe on and was
very slowly closing my position appearing slightly up positive but actually not changing altitude. it continued on a northern course as i watched through the tree limbs about 3 to 4 minutes then it appeared to hover about 1 min turn bluish and then back to orange. as i watched, it stopped any forward motion and started an ascent about 10:17. in order
to track or see the target i went to my front yard and noticed the object was still ascending and was high in the sky at about the 11:00 o'clock position well above the trees. it was still orange and i noticed the strobe of 2 commercial flights being slightly white. the object still had no strobe and at that position started north across the clear sky. at that
time i saw what looked like very bright blue and reddish flashing coming from the craft. watching the craft at altitude i could still see the north bound commercial flight strobe but the object just disappeared. 

i have 23 years of service from helicopter crewman in the army to navy aircrew in s-3 vikings and p-3 orion antisubmarine aircraft. my wife also witnessed part of this.
content.summary: Saw a roundish orange disc low in the sky turn multiple colors with no noise then hover and rapidly ascend above commercial flights and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: Came upon this image while exploring google maps when looking for my parents' street.
content.summary: Came upon this image while exploring google maps when looking for my parents' street.

content.detailedDescription: Bits star ,at big also each not exiitt.
content.summary: Seen etilo lobby at begin 2010summer

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on the couch, watching tv with my significant other.  the north side of my house has twelve windows, arranged at the house's corner, 2 stacks of three on each side of the corner to about 24 feet high, so there is plenty to see.

i noticed the first light in the rightmost top window, it had an arc to it as it fell, which eventually became a straight line down.  the light was constant & white, with a small blue twinge to it's edges.  it had no speed or didn't appear to be propelled, was just kind of falling at the normal rate one might expect any object to fall.  there was no trail.  initially, i had thought it was a shooting star or meteorite, until i had a minute to think about it's odd behavior.

the second light appeared in the middle of the left side windows, it had the same color as the first, but accelerated straight up at an alarming rate.  i would estimate the distance from the first light somewhere between 5 and 7 miles apart.

the third was seen by us both, in about the exact middle area between the first two.  it was moving more horizontally, but not in a straight line as an aircraft would.   instead, it kind of lazily meandered about���a little up & a little down at a relaxed speed before it disappeared behind the mountain, but had the same light color & properties as the first two did.
content.summary: Falling light, followed 25 mins later by a very quick vertical ascent

content.detailedDescription:
my 12 yr old and i witnessed stationary lights in the sky again above oswego, il. it was the same place and time of day as our november 10, 2011 sighting. we noticed them both days at 3:25pm in the western sky. the sun was getting lower in the sky and there were scattered clouds, though the sky was mostly sunny. the conditions were very similar to our sighting in november. two lights were at the lower cloud level and seemed to be attempting (poorly) to blend in with the clouds. one light appeared to the lower right (west) of the sun and the other was farther to the right (slightly northwest). we only saw them for a minute and then lost them and had to keep driving.
   when i got to our home, about a mile away, i got out our sony handycam and caught at least one light on it at about 4:00 pm. the stationary light was in the clouds directly to the west, to the right of the setting sun. the lights were lower and bigger than the airplanes that were present before and after. i focused in on one light and it appeared almost a triangular shape with fuzzy edges and it was a glowing reddish-pink on the top point, white in the center and green on the bottom two points. the video is shaky but if you pause on it you can really see the colors.
   to the naked eye, the lights were bigger than the size that stars look, closer to the size that jupiter looks right now from our area.
   these lights were stationary, not airplanes, as i was also watching and comparing them to airplanes higher in the atmosphere with their contrails. there were no large planes at that level in the sky, all were much higher. there were no helicopters or small planes in the area when the lights appeared. the lights are not venus or conventional aircraft or the space station or weather balloons, as some have suggested to me. they are stationary and fairly close to the ground.
   also, a dark helicopter flew by about 20 minutes after the light was filmed.
   right after the events our wii froze and wouldn't turn off, has never happened before, and our cell phone wasn't responding when we wanted to play songs, which also hasn't happened before.    
   at the time i was just so satisfied that i had caught one of these lights on camera. but as the week has gone on i am finding myself unnerved about what these are and what they're doing. i cannot think about anything else. i'm also extremely frustrated with the complete denial/dismissal of the general population. 
   my 12 year old, who spotted the lights the first time, and saw the lights both times, wants to forget that it happened and is slipping into denial. i don't blame my 12 yr old, at that age it must be hard to accept.
   if you live in the area and want to check it out, watching from orchard road in oswego would give you the best view. i'm guessing they'll show up again on mostly sunny days, when there are some low, thin clouds in the western and slightly northwestern sky. so far they have all been to the right of the sun. make sure to begin watching at about 3:15 pm at about 40 degrees above the horizon, or at about the level of the sun.
content.summary: Unknown stationary daytime lights in western sky

content.detailedDescription: Woke up with the baby around 1am. noticed very bright white to blue light on hillside behind house in copse of trees;never have seeen a light in the same location ever. i watched the lighted object for 15 minutes before going to help with child. when i came back it was gone. the light was very bright, like an airplane landing light. light did not project in a single direction; light was emitted omni-directionally. light pulsated slightly and changed colors slightly between white and blue. object appeared to be hovereing or was landed; there was not wavering in object movement. occasionally a slight spin or rotation was noted in the light pattern in the trees. i felt it was not a normal object or activity. i investigated the area the following day. no signs of burns or landing impressions were noted. no houses, roads, or other structures noted in the area of sighting. powerlines were located at point of observation. my impression is that the object was drawing power from the electrical lines.
content.summary: Hovering intense white-blue light, approx. 500-1000 feet away

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from getting gas for my parents in their car when i turned west on schoeller pl when i noticed a very orange starlike object over the mountains between northe las cruces and north tularosa, i continued to my house as i watched it brighten in intensity and then decrease in brightnes. i pulled up to my house and alerted my family, my mother,sister, niece and nephew, we all stood on the raised deck and watched the object brighten and dim then change colors before dimming out completey after 20 minutes of being stationary not to return the rest of the night. i experienced a feeling of seeing an ol friend.
content.summary: Driving home from town saw it over the whites sands military range mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling west on rt.176 away from lake michigan when i noticed what appeared to be a glare on my windshield. i leaned forward to realize this small object in the sky that was traveling south at a high rate of speed. it was silver looking with the rising sun reflecting off of it. i watched it travel for about 6 seconds and it simply disappeared, seemingly just as i realized i was viewing something that wasnt a plane.
content.summary: Silver object traveling south

content.detailedDescription: I can't describe it as my english is not so good for that. but please see attached video. it is really incredible...
content.summary: I can't describe it as my english is not so good for that. but please see attached video.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back home to knoxville after dropping my child off at her mothers. it was a very clear night and i was scanning the sky as i often do under favorable circumstances. i was just turning my head forward from glancing at venus to my left and then i noticed a star above the trees ahead. there was oncoming traffic coming up the other side of the hill that i was ascending, so my attention was briefly drawn to switching to my low-beams, while also noticing the light from the other cars headlights reflect off of the power lines on the left-hand side of the road. precisely at that moment, the star(which was directly ahead and to the right of the power lines) suddenly increased a little in brightness while changing to a pale orange color. it then ascended straight up, getting exponentially faster as it went, and changing to a pale blue color, and disappeared.

immediately afterwards, the oncoming vehicle came into view and i had to turn my attention back to driving. now i have driven this road hundreds of times, day and night, and in all conditions, with oncoming traffic on any given stretch including this one, and never have i seen any normal lights play such a trick on my eyes, so now i start contemplating what i saw. there is almost always air traffic within a few miles, because the airport and air national guard base are close by. but, i am probably more familiar with different types of aircraft than the average person. my father was in the air force for twenty years and i have been to a few air shows and to the wright-patterson air and space museum a number of times. this was no conventional man-made aircraft. i know the experience was brief, but i know what i saw.(?) i also remember feeling as if, when the light brightened, it wanted me to see it. i havent been able to quit thinking about it, so i must tell someone. who better else to tell?
content.summary: While driving north, i noticed what i first thought was a star. it was white, then seemed to grow brighter and pale orange and fade to blue as it ascended very rapidly and dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My tv went out and i had just died in the oblivion 4 game i was playing, so i decided to go to bed, but before i went to bed i decided to put out our 4 boston terriers.   as soon as i walked outside in my backyard with them and i saw the object heading right at me.   very long the length of a football field but the width was i'd say about 40 feet long, very rectagular shaped flat front divided in 3 sections top section all lit up in white neon lighting had five smaller rectangle shapes, middle and bottom had the same with larger rectangles but all the same in length, the object had a flat nose and a flat back.  the object made no noise it came from the east just about 50 ft above the treetops heading west. the bottom of the ship was pitch black with neon white light outlining the ship.  i've seen blimps and know what they sound like this was no blimp and it was moving way to quickly to be one and made no sound.   the whole sighting lasted less than 30 seconds and it was gone.  it cleared the treetops in my backyard flew right over me and my house heading west lost sight of it when it flew over the house.  i felt kind of awestruck seeing the object, but the next day i had trouble with my equalibrium and fell in the kitchen.  not one of our dogs left the porch while the object was flying over, but when it passed they all went out in the yard.
content.summary: Giant flying rectangular wharehouse divided in 3-5 rectangular sections, the top being smaller than the bottom 10 rectangles, but they were all the same length.

content.detailedDescription:
First, we would like to apologize for taking so long to report this. after we saw it, we spent a year talking about it and collecting the info we had. we didn't report it because, well, who would believe it? we didn't even tell our families about it and probably won't. i mean, if my friend had told me about it, i wouldn't have believed it either and i trust him explicitly. my brain wouldn't have allowed me to believe such a tale, so i would have presumed he was mistaken about what he actually saw and thought little of it. this is why reporting it never seemed like a good idea to us.

let's just say my attitude has changed recently, and now i feel i owe it to the world to share what we saw for better or worse, so here goes.

it was my first day of retirement from a company i had been employed by for 12 years. it was monday, january 3, 2011 on the nw side of gainesville near publix on main street. after relaxing all day, a good friend of 10 years dropped by to hang out for a while and catch up from the holidays.

my back yard features a beautiful panoramic view of the eastern sky with a small 80 foot tree line about 60 yards away or so. the sky features air traffic going to and from south florida as well as local air traffic from gpd, shands, and gainesville airport. planes, helicopters, and falling stars are seen regularly, so it's a great place to just hang out and look up.

around 7pm, we decided to go out back for a smoke. as we faced due east, my friend was staring up at the sky, while i was directly to his right staring off into the neighborhood while running my mouth about something. it was around 48-50 degrees and crystal clear. a cold front had moved in so there was no haze, no fog, no moon, and we both had coats on.

at 7:09, it happened. my friend was staring up at the sky, and in the exact spot where he was looking, a small, somewhat upright, equal triangle with slightly rounded edges just materialized out of nowhere at least 30,000 feet or so up (cruising altitude for planes). it had 6 - 10 larger green and white lights underneath and 3 smaller half-oval white lights in the middle of each side. the body of the craft was dark. a split second after he saw it, it descended straight down - only the full bottom of the craft visible - then swooped at the end and leveled off in less than 4 seconds. again, it fell tens of thousands of feet and leveled off at a low altitude in less than 4 seconds - easily less than 400 feet. i estimate it at 150 feet altitude or even less. unreal. 

at the end of the descent, as it began to swoop and level off, my friend suddenly grabbed my left arm tightly as gasped "look!" while pointing to the east. i expected a falling star or something. as soon as i looked up over the tree line, the first thing i saw was a fuzzy, white, cloudy...Thing... surrounded by a strange watery substance - it was like a mirage - moving closer to us. as it cleared the tree line, it became clear what it was: it was a cloaked triangle and it was creeping towards our direction at 10mph. it looked to be about 50' long along each side, but it could have been a bit bigger or smaller - it's very hard to be sure as there's no frame of reference for what we saw. this thing didn't waiver, tilt, or wobble at all - it was dead still moving only forward. although the cloaking had a somewhat wavy nature about it, it wasn't vibrating or moving either. everything about this craft was dead still except for the slow forward movement.

we had a prefect, unobstructed view of this craft for a full 5 to 7 seconds before it disappeared over the trees in the middle of my block behind my house. it was a cloaked triangle craft. there was a fuzzy, whitish, haze in the front middle and along the leading edges. i also saw some rounding in the back of the fuzzy white where it met the cloaking. it wasn't light - it was a faint white. we could completely see through the craft, but not the white fuzzy stuff. when the craft passed in front of the stars, the stars jiggled. when the craft fully passed, the stars were dead still again. i'll never forget the feeling of just how still the stars are after seeing them jiggle. wow. 

the cloaked triangle had no visible lights of any kind while cloaked - at least none that we could see. we had a clear view of the bottom, the right side, and the front tip of the craft, but never had a view of the back side, the left side, or the top. although i heard no sound, my friend described it as, and these are his words, "it sounded like it was pushing the air out of the way". it was hovering absolutely straight and forward west-southwest at approximately 10mph. the entire event lasted around 11 seconds.

after it passed, we were left in disbelief. it was the most incredible thing we had ever witnessed - absolutely as gorgeous as it was mysterious - and it was right in front of us. not high up in the sky or off in the distance, but right there! unreal. the greatest thing i have ever seen in my life.

in the year after the sighting, my friend and i spoke about it from time to time, gathering the details of the experience, and separating what we were certain of from what we merely thought we saw. everything i've included here is what we are certain of. both of our phones were inside the house when we saw this, so we were unable to get video or pics since it happened so suddenly.

i also spent time during that year trying to find other reports of the same craft. i googled "cloaked triangle" and "camouflaged triangle", checked reports at mufon, and never found anything except a video of a cloaked triangle emitting a vapor trail which was suspect and definitely not what we saw.

then, the morning after the anniversary of the sighting this past week, i decided to add "gainesville, fl" to my search and, to my utter shock, found a report at the nuforc site from someone who saw the exact same craft in the exact same city on the exact same night as we did - jan 3, 2011 in gainesville, fl. this changed everything for me and is why i now feel it's my duty to report what we saw. the only difference was they saw it a half hour before we did. since we saw it descend, this means one of three things: either there were two crafts, or the craft they saw went back up and descended back down over my neighborhood, or they were mistaken about the time by 30 minutes or so. but the description was identical right down to it "pushing air out of the way". although we saw a somewhat blueish hue, we presumed it was simply colors from the night sky being refracted and left it out of this report since we weren't certain about it.

we would love to talk to that other witness and will ask nuforc to pass on our contact info if they'd like to share stories. should anyone report the same craft to mufon, they can share my email address as well. i want to know more about all of this, believe me.

we have made video and audio interviews about this and my friend made a drawing of the triangle in it's un-cloaked form 2 days after we saw it, which i now have. we'd be happy to share all of this with mufon if they are interested.
content.summary: A triangle (equal with slightly rounded edges) appeared out of thin air, made an impossibly fast decent, stopped on a dime, then hovered slowly forward over the middle of my block.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and myself off road by farm to take pictures with digital cameras. i got about ten uneventful/ordinary photos. however, 4 of them showed additional images not visible to the eyes of either myself or my wife. the images appeared to change nature, shape, color, and location - across all 4 photos. in first pic, there appears to be bright green, translucent glowing mist, serpentine sort of drifting shape - like smoke. cannot see with eyes. total shock to see on the photographed image, when nothing of the sort was seen by either of us. 
in the second picture, the green smoke has already gathered at the opposite side of the field, and appears much larger, with a lot more smoke. in the center of the smoke is a bright glowing whitish/greenish irregularly shaped brilliant light - to the left of it is a red, translucent, boomerang shaped red shape (looks like lens flare - from the glowing object). 
in the 3 pic the glowing irregular (perhaps basketball size) bright light has moved and appears on our side of the field, and still has the red lens flare to its left.
in the 4 pic, the object is leaving the ground and hovering at the opposite end of the field, surrounded by quite a large serpentine-like hovering bright green mist or smoke like substance.
i have these photos on my camera, and have entered them into my photoshop catalog.
i would be happy to email them, and/or have someone examine them. i have no idea what the images are.
we did not see these images during the time we were taking pictures. they simply were invisible to the naked eye but somehow detectable through digital medium.
i do not understand what ive got. but it is quite weird; very strange.
my email address is [email address removed/cms/tg].
my wife and i both felt shock and surprise that my camera took pictures of something wed not seem at all.
we do know that these images are not anything ordinary that we can think of.
note: im not skilled at digital photography, having shot film all my life. i need some help from you guys to load the whole set of pics. i had taken some normal ones too, and they are good to establish a kind of baseline, and as control pics to compare with the anomalous ones. youve given me only 3 slots into which to send ten pics. tell me how to get them all to you.
content.summary: Showed up on digital image after photo taken; not visible to the eye
content.locationName: Between newberg and the c, Oregon

content.detailedDescription: As i approached moretown about 10:30 pm,  heading north on rte 100 i saw a yellowish light in the distance.  at first i thought it was the top of a radio tower on top of a hill somewhere.  as i got closer to town i realized there is no tower anywhere close by.  i was getting closer to the object and i could make it out better as i kept driving.  when i got into moretown i could tell that the object was moving very slowly through the sky, only about 300 feet above the ground.  i started driving up the hill to my home and when i got to the top and the view wasn't obscured by trees i pulled over and opened my window.  the object was flying very low yet i could not hear any noise.  the shape was almost diamond-like or trapezoidal.  it almost looked like 2 helicopters were flying one in front of the other, really close, but i would have been able to hear them so close to the ground. it was a big dark object but it had several yellow lights underneath and also a red light.  it kept flying and eventually flew over the area of my car.  soon i lost sight of it over the trees.  i got home and searched online and someone reported a similar sighting about a couple days ago over interstate 91.
content.summary: As i drove up the hill to my house i saw a large object flying slowly about 300 feet above ground.  i was diamond/trapezoidal shaped with several yellow lights.  i pulled over and it flew over my car into the distance.

content.detailedDescription: It was spring time in 2008 when my sister and i witnessed something strange over the fields in plainsboro.  my sister, aimee, had picked me up from work one night.  i was driving home with her in the passenger seat when i spotted an orange sphere that looked like it was on fire except without flames.  we both were in awe because it was like nothing we had ever seen.  it was way up in the air, about the altitiude that airplanes fly.  it made very abrupt and weird movements and left a trail of the same color behind it that never dissipated.  it went up, then down, then right, then left, but it seemed like it was under some sort of control.  we stayed for about five minutes, then left.  it was still doing the same things when we left.  we both went through what it possibly could have been, but came up with nothing.
content.summary: My sister and i saw a glowing orange sphere that left a crazy trail.
